Name: Path of Kami: Journey Begins
About the game: Path of Kami is a relaxing puzzle exploration game following the spirit of a Japanese wolf Kazeyo as he navigates the trials of the Mortal and Spirit World through puzzles. He is accompanied by Wisp companion who is there to guide him on his journey. Path of Kami contains elements of both traditional Japanese folktales (Momotaro, Issun-Boushi), as well as a more personal journey for the main character. RELAX AND USE YOUR SPIRIT FIRE POWER Solve puzzles and discover secrets with creative uses of your spirit fire powers EXPLORE AND FIND COLLECTIBLES Explore environments inspired by Japan and collect a variety of collectibles SOOTHING MUSIC Enjoy a beautiful, relaxing soundtrack composed by Mark Choi. Journey Begins features a portion of Kazeyo's journey through the Mortal realm and an introduction to the Path of Kami world! Features Explore beautiful landscapes set in ancient Japan Find and collect a variety of collectibles Solve puzzles by lighting lanterns Enjoy a heartwarming story about a wolf and his Wisp companion A handcrafted 3D painterly world A beautiful relaxing soundtrack
